title: Weekly Product Pulse: Nov 17-23, 2025
overview: This week's pulse highlights critical user dissatisfaction stemming from significant challenges in customer support and payment processing. Users frequently report unresponsiveness and ineffective support, alongside issues like delayed refunds, unauthorized deductions, and withdrawal problems, significantly impacting the overall product experience and trust.

themes.name: Customer Support
themes.summary: Users report highly negative experiences with customer support, citing unresponsiveness, long wait times, and ineffective resolutions for critical account issues.

themes.name: Payments
themes.summary: Users frequently encounter severe negative issues related to payments, including unauthorized deductions, prolonged refund delays, and withdrawal problems impacting access to funds.

quotes: Customer Support: the custmer support team very bad no one response when u got a problem
Customer Support: customer support is pathetic and useless don't use this app
Payments: Paisa kat liya customer help nahin karta hai... refund nahin mila 3 Mahina ho chuka hai
actions: Conduct an urgent audit of customer support channels and agent training to improve response times and resolution efficacy for user queries.
Prioritize investigation and resolution of all reported unauthorized deductions and long-pending refunds, with proactive user communication.
Review and optimize payment processing workflows to ensure timely liquid fund redemptions and reliable withdrawal functionality within stated timeframes.
